translations: n.恼怒；恶化；惹人恼怒的事

phrs.translation: 恼怒, 长吁短叹, 恶化, 激怒

sentences.sentence: He shook his head in exasperation.

sentences.sentence: There was exasperation in her reply, half sigh and half groan.
